name: Fly Swatter (✨charly✨)
description:
A game inspired by the Mario Paint minigame "Gnat Attack". Made with LOVE2D/LÖVE in lua. GitHub

Credits

Assets and Code made by sleepycharlyy. Inspired by the Mario Paint minigame "Gnat Attack". Uses the LÖVE Engine. Font: duckinator/awoof under MIT License.
